pullRequest.title: New Tests for ServerStartPolicy
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR address the following change
a. Add new Tests for ServerStartPolicy on different level( domain, administrative server, and managed server )
Ref : https://oracle.github.io/weblogic-kubernetes-operator/userguide/managing-domains/domain-lifecycle/startup/
Note :  Standalone managed Server Level policy migration ( IF_NEEDED-->NEVER->IF_NEEDED/ALWAYS) does not work
The tests are disabled until  OWLS-84380 is resolved
b. Removal of Corresponding Junit4 IT classes
